thread.title: ‘Amazed’ Van Gaal slams Man U’s lack of aggression against Arsenal
thread.title_full: ‘Amazed’ Van Gaal slams Man U’s lack of aggression against Arsenal

author: NewsWire
title: ‘Amazed’ Van Gaal slams Man U’s lack of aggression against Arsenal
text:
Added on October 5, 2015 NewsWire ‘Amazed’ Van Gaal slams Man U’s lack of aggression against Arsenal 0 0 0 0 0 
London, Oct.5 (ANI): Manchester United manager Louis Van Gaal has admitted that he was ‘amazed’ by his side’s lack of aggression against Arsenal during their Premier League clash at the Emirates Stadium. 
United suffered a shocking 0-3 defeat against Arsenal that moved them down to the third spot in the EPL table. 
The Dutchman said he was surprised by his players’ attitude, saying there was no will to win the match despite being at the top of the league, the Mirror reports. 
Further expressing his views on United’s defeat, the 64-year-old admitted that Arsenal were much more aggressive at that moment and there was a lack of ball-winning from his side. 
United will now play against Everton in their Premier League clash on October 17 at Goodison Park. (ANI)
